triples.name: Data Mining
triples.relevance: Core topic of KDD conference - the automated extraction and discovery of patterns in massive datasets.

triples.name: Knowledge Discovery
triples.relevance: Primary focus of the conference, referring to the process of automatically searching large data volumes for meaningful patterns.

triples.name: Machine Learning
triples.relevance: Central methodology discussed at KDD for developing algorithms that learn from data and perform tasks without explicit instructions.

triples.name: Data Science
triples.relevance: Interdisciplinary field combining statistics, computing, and domain expertise that is emphasized throughout the conference.

triples.name: Large Language Model
triples.relevance: Emerging technology highlighted as a major focus with dedicated LLM Day, keynotes, and panels at KDD 2023.

triples.name: Open Peer Review
triples.relevance: Platform (OpenReview) newly adopted by KDD 2023 to improve review quality and facilitate reviewer-author interactions.

triples.name: Artificial Intelligence
triples.relevance: Broad field encompassing all the research topics presented at the conference, noted as emerging in all societal fields.
